attributes.action: Make it mandatory that pregnant women/families are made more aware of Pre-eclampsia and its symptoms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After losing my own firstborn, my son Liam due to severe pre-eclampsia when I was 31 weeks pregnant, I feel that more people (pregnant women & families) should be made more aware of pre-eclampsia and its symptoms.
During pregnancy, a woman and the child she is carrying is basically putting their lives in the hands of health professionals and I don't believe we are given enough information about this potentially fatal illness.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Make it mandatory that pregnant women/families are made more aware of Pre-eclampsia and its symptoms."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17547


Prime Minister's Office
